briefdescription.para: Gets if feedback message is hidden.

parameterdescription.para: The message identifier from Feedback Messages.
The PC or OBJECT_INVALID for a global setting.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the message is hidden.

briefdescription.para: Sets if feedback message is hidden.

parameterdescription.para: The PC or OBJECT_INVALID for a global setting.

simplesect.para: Personal state overrides the global state which means if a global state is set to TRUE but the personal state is set to FALSE, the message will be shown to the PC.

briefdescription.para: Gets if combat log message is hidden.

parameterdescription.para: The message identifier from Combat Log Messages.
The PC or OBJECT_INVALID for a global setting.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the message is hidden.

briefdescription.para: Sets if combat log message is hidden.

parameterdescription.para: The PC or OBJECT_INVALID for a global setting.

simplesect.para: Personal state overrides the global state which means if a global state is set to TRUE but the personal state is set to FALSE, the message will be shown to the PC.

briefdescription.para: Gets if the journal update message is hidden.

parameterdescription.para: The PC or OBJECT_INVALID for a global setting.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the message is hidden.

briefdescription.para: Sets if journal update message is hidden.

parameterdescription.para: The PC or OBJECT_INVALID for a global setting.

simplesect.para: Personal state overrides the global state which means if a global state is set to TRUE but the personal state is set to FALSE, the message will be shown to the PC.

briefdescription.para: Set whether to use a blacklist or whitelist mode for feedback messages.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE for all messages to be hidden by default, default FALSE.

briefdescription.para: Set whether to use a blacklist or whitelist mode for combat log messages.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE for all messages to be hidden by default, default FALSE.

simplesect.para: If using Whitelist, be sure to whitelist NWNX_FEEDBACK_COMBATLOG_FEEDBACK for feedback messages to work.
